quizzes.title: History Quiz: Hannah Montana and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your history knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering History, actor, trek. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Name the Amazing Race 3 winning team.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flo and Zach

questions.question: Did Kelly and Jon win the Amazing Race 4?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: She played Mrs. Jaffray in Backstairs At the White House and Ida in Malcolm in the Middle. My personal favorite role of hers was as Phyllis in The Marry Tyler Moore Show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cloris Leachman

questions.question: Hannah Montana is Miley Stewart.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which team won in the 2nd season of the Amazing Race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chris and Alex

questions.question: Name the guy who is Mileys best friend on the TV show Hannah Montana.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oliver

questions.question: He won a KATY Award for best supporting actor in Ordinary People. He has appeared on JAG and on Prison Break but back in 1979, he played Butler Dixon on Backstairs at the White House.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Downing

questions.question: Who were the winners of the 1st installment of the Amazing Race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rob and Brennan

questions.question: What is the MALP in the Stargate universe?

options.text: A space ship capable of intergalactic travel
A machine which can change a persons DNA
A space ship capable of interstellar travel but not intergalactic travel

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An unmanned probe

questions.question: Which Star Trek Next Generation actor did not appear on Days of Our Lives?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Patrick Stewart (Captain Jean-Luc Picard)

questions.question: On the TV show Hannah Montana, Lilly and Oliver find a potato chip shaped like what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Darth Vader

questions.question: In the Stargate TV show, many mythological characters from Earths history were actually aliens. Which of the following was an Ancient?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Merlin

questions.question: The actor, who played Dwight Eisenhower in Backstairs at the White House, starred in Lancer in the 60s and early 70s as Murdock Lancer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Does Lilly have a secret identity on the TV show Hannah Montana?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In the TV series Hannah Montana, is the name of Mileys best friend Lauren?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ken Morley

questions.question: What is the popular hangout spot for teens and young adults in the fictional city of Sunnydale?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sun Cinema

questions.question: In the final episode of the Buffy series, which character said, We destroyed the mall? I fought on the wrong side.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dawn
